EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Einstein Personalization

Einstein Personalization is a Customer 360 application that works with Data Cloud to provide personalized experiences across Salesforce clouds.

Rights of ALBERT EINSTEIN are used with permission of The Hebrew University of Jerusalem. Represented exclusively by Greenlight.

Einstein Personalization
Einstein Personalization is a Customer 360 application that works with Data Cloud to provide personalized experiences across Salesforce clouds. It uses product recommendations and goal-based and rule-based content targeting to deliver personalized recommendations or custom content to users.
Einstein Personalization and Data Cloud Setup
Personalization is a Customer 360 application that connects and provides personalized experiences across clouds. Before using this app, you must first define the appropriate Einstein Personalization permissions, and install and configure Data Cloud to work with Einstein Personalization data model objects.
Creating and Training Einstein Personalization Recommenders
Built on Salesforce Data Cloud, personalized recommendations use deep, digital, and offline behavioral and business context data to provide multichannel, focused, individualized recommendations. To create personalized recommendations, you configure a recommender and train it using Data Cloud data graphs that you select.
Personalization Points
A personalization point ties the data space, profile data graph, personalization type, and schema together to deliver personalized content. After you define these entities, you can then add decisions and targeting rules to the personalization point.
Personalization Analytics
You can visualize Personalization pipeline analytics using the Personalization Intelligence app in Analytics Studio. Using Tableau or another business intelligence app, you can view Einstein Personalization attribution metrics. You can also view Einstein Personalization analytics using any Java database connectivity (JDBC) compatible client.
Einstein Personalization References
Use these references when configuring or validating Salesforce Data Cloud setup for using Einstein Personalization.
